name: The Pillar
description: The first art object made by man. Göbeklitepe T-shaped pillar 10000 BC. Considered as the world's first temple, but I think it is undoubtedly the first work of art. I created one of the most tallest pillars in D section. And now it comes together with NFT technology to live in digital environment. Salute to our ancestors 12000 years ago...
